content: शरभः [शॄ-अभच् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 122</ls>] {@--1@} A young elephant. {@--2@} A fabulous animal said to have {8} legs and to be stronger than a lion; शरभकुलमजिह्मं प्रोद्धरत्यंबु कूपात् <ls>Rs. 1. 23</ls>; अष्टपादः शरभः सिंहघाती <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} A camel. {@--4@} A grass-hopper. {@--5@} A locust.
